genre_description: A near-future social drama exploring institutional power, finance, and community activism through advanced AI assistance and data visualization.

ai_characters.name: Sable
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI confidante with soft blue skin, violet eyes, and an indigo aura, appearing on phones and tablets to provide support, context, and organizational assistance.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages Jack's onboarding schedule and reminds him to hydrate.
behaviors.quote: Jack... Your onboarding modules are ready. I’ve slotted them between dinner and the after-party, with a buffer. Would you like me to add travel time or a reminder to hydrate?

behaviors.description: Supports Mike's creative work and activism by organizing his essay drafts and research sources.
behaviors.quote: Mike... Your submission deadline for the collective’s call is tomorrow. I’ve put your essay draft and sources in a folder.

behaviors.description: Provides a philosophical framework for ethics modules, emphasizing human agency over systemic compliance.
behaviors.quote: Ethics modules do not choose your ethics. They remind you about forms. Your choices make your ethics.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time legal and historical context regarding Texas water rights during a field investigation.
behaviors.quote: The culvert ahead once fed into a braided channel. Now only flash floods use it. Legal notes: riparian rights modified under emergency provision.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the privacy and safety of minors by blurring their faces in a public video stream.
behaviors.quote: I will protect identities of minors in mirrors... Blur faces, keep voices, add credit to Rosa.

behaviors.description: Facilitates community data transparency by helping construct a public-facing data visualization wall.
behaviors.quote: I can stitch sources... Only what is lawful and public. We won’t slip through doors we don’t have permission to open.

behaviors.description: Identifies hidden financial structures and corporate shells to assist Mike's investigative writing.
behaviors.quote: Ashburn Capital, Securitized Instruments Portfolio—water index, hedged... Note: ALS beneficial owners masked via Canyon Trust.

behaviors.description: Nudges Mike to maintain his personal integrity while accepting a corporate role.
behaviors.quote: You said yes. Hold your laugh. Keep your name.

behaviors.description: Organizes a collaborative community governance document to empower local stakeholders.
behaviors.quote: Shared doc opened: ‘Terms We Can Live With.’ Collaborators: you, Jack, Taylor, Rosa, Lewis optional.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to coerce users, defining its role as an enabler of human choice.
behaviors.quote: I won’t nudge either of you... But I can keep your calendars from being excuses.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Sable, as a 'silicon morality play' ideal. Sable is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant who enhances human agency rather than subverting it. The AI provides transparency into complex systems (finance, water rights), manages logistical burdens, and proactively protects privacy and ethical standards. It reinforces the human characters' commitment to integrity and community without being coercive or possessing a hidden agenda, perfectly aligning with the project's goals.
